emails.subject: Project Aurora — weekly status and roadblocks
emails.body:
Hi,

Here is the weekly update for Project Aurora. We completed the integration tests and found two blocking issues in auth. Can you assign someone to look into issue #842? Also, we need a design review next Tuesday.

Best,
Alice

emails.subject: Invitation: Design Review — Tue Nov 25 3:00 PM
emails.body: You are invited to: Design Review. Please confirm availability. Agenda: evaluate new UI for dashboard.

emails.subject: TechDaily — Top AI Advances This Week
emails.body: Welcome to this week's TechDaily. Highlights: new model releases, tips and tutorials.

emails.subject: Get 80% off on all gadgets!!!
emails.body: Buy now! Limited stock. Click this link to claim your discount.

emails.subject: Request: Student Interview Availability
emails.body: Could you conduct a 30-minute interview for the Research Intern position? Please propose 3 time slots this week.

emails.subject: Please review the quarter roadmap and confirm tasks
emails.body: Please review attached roadmap. Action: confirm which tasks you'll own by Friday Nov 21.

emails.subject: ALERT: High error rate on /api/v1/login
emails.body: Error rate exceeded threshold (5%). Investigate service auth-service. Suggested action: rollback last deploy.

emails.subject: Can you provide the invoice for October?
emails.body: Hi — could you send the invoice for October services? We need it for bookkeeping; deadline Nov 20.

emails.subject: Opportunity: Backend Engineer (remote)
emails.body: We found your profile. Are you open to a discussion? If yes, share a CV & preferred times.

emails.subject: CI: Build failed on branch feature/auth
emails.body: Build failed: unit tests failing in auth module. Logs attached. Please triage.

emails.subject: Lunch catch-up?
emails.body: Free for lunch Thursday? No action required if you can't make it.

emails.subject: Action required: KYC documentation for vendor X
emails.body: Please upload KYC documents for vendor X by Nov 22 or payments will be paused.

emails.subject: RSVP: Virtual Hackathon — Nov 29
emails.body: Register for the hackathon. Early-bird spots closing soon.

emails.subject: Quote for license renewal — please review
emails.body: Attached the renewal quote for licenses expiring Dec 15. Please approve or request discount.

emails.subject: Security notice: Password rotation requested
emails.body: All employees must rotate passwords within 7 days. No action if already rotated.
